interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 14 in 1 Combo Set Professional White Clear Pink Powder DIY Acryic Nail Art Decorations Kit Brush Cuticle Revitalizer Oil Pen Tools Rhinestones Sanding Buffer Forms Nail Tips Glue Set
Review Date: 2014/11/12
Store: RY
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'RY', 'Item Form': 'Powder'}
Review Text: First off, I could smell the acrylic the second I opened it. The powders had powder on the outside of the jars, the brush is the size of a Qtip and hard like it was used. The worst part that pist me off so bad, the glue was half gone and a solid chunk. I doubt I will get new glue from them so I'm screwed. (Stores were closed by the time I realized it). Other than ALL that I guess it's ok. Wish I would have gotten a better one for couple dollars more!
Review Title: So irritating!!!
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Focus**: Beauty and personal care, specifically nail art and acrylic supplies.
- **Quality Expectations**: Expects high-quality products; has expressed dissatisfaction with product condition and completeness.
- **Frustration Tolerance**: Shows low tolerance for product defects and poor customer service experiences; irritation over incomplete items.
- **Value Sensitivity**: Disappointed with perceived value; indicates a willingness to pay slightly more for better quality.
- **Material Preferences**: Engaged with acrylic materials but noted strong chemical odors negatively impacting the experience.
- **Review Patterns**: Utilizes reviews to articulate both negative experiences and expectations for product performance.
